Pour rendre la tâche plus difficile, votre hélicoptères a une quantité limitée de carburant. Dans tout le niveau il y a des réservoirs de carburant. Si l'un d'eux est abattu ou bombardé, vous recevrez un carburant supplémentaire. À mesure que vous avancez le jeu devient plus difficile.

locale.title: Super Cross Force
locale.synopsis: There's a new menace in the galaxy! It's the evil Morplus from the planet Tzoris. Morplus are without question the fiercest warriors east of the Libra Super-Galactic Cluster. They arrive in teams of two to four members, and in waves with the more dangerous squadrons arriving later. In the more advanced skill levels, they're impossible to stop! Both their flight patterns and bombing maneuvers are highly unpredictable. What can you do against odds like these? There's only one hope: you must catch them in a devastating super cross force. The key is your awesome "Spectron" weapon, which creates a dual holographic laser blast. You can get them coming and going, and if you run low on energy, you can deftly swing your joystick to the left or right to catch the energy packs dropped by your mother ship.

Il y a une nouvelle menace dans la galaxie! Le maléfique Morplus de la planète Tzoris. Les guerriers de Morplus sont sans conteste les les plus farouches de la communauté est de la galaxie de Libra . Ils arrivent en équipes de deux à quatre, et des vagues avec les escadrons plus dangereux arrivent plus tard. Dans les niveaux plus élevés, ils sont impossibles à arrêter!. Que pouvez-vous faire dans un tel conflit? Il n'y a qu'un seul espoir: vous devez les arrêter. La clé de votre réussite est votre 'Spectron' arme qui crée un double laser holographique.

locale.title: Super DK!
locale.synopsis: Super Donkey Kong for ColecoVision is a hacked version of the enhanced game made for Coleco's Adam computer. The main difference you will notice is the addition of the intermission sequences. While these were present in the arcade version of the game, Coleco elected to omit them in the cartridge version. They make for a more arcade-like experience but add nothing to the game.

Super Donkey Kong pour ColecoVision est une version piratée et améliorée du jeu conçu pour l'ordinateur Adam de Coleco.Mario, appelé alors Jumpman, doit secourir une demoiselle en détresse, capturée par un gorille géant, Donkey Kong.

locale.title: Super DK! Junior
locale.synopsis:
Definitely the better of the two "Super DK" games, this is a top-notch arcade translation for ANY home platform. It's origination is exactly the same as the super version of Donkey Kong.
The thing making this version "super" over the regular released version is the extra level. Unlike Super Donkey Kong, there are no added intermission sequences but instead, all available extra cartridge space is used to make the extra level complete and playable.
Donkey Kong Jr. finds himself having to navigate electrified conveyor belts in his quest to rescue his father. For the most part, the level is fairly easy to complete. Simple timing is the only thing needed as there are no enemies to dodge other than the electricity and randomly falling bird droppings. As you reach this level later on in the game, the previously unseen birds appear making it more challenging.
The "normal" three levels of the released version of the game are naturally present as well but there are no differences. If you enjoy the version of Donkey Kong Jr. you likely already have in your collection, chalk this one up as a must-have as the added level is certainly a welcome addition to the game.
Jeu Prototype.Super DK! Junior est la suite du jeu d'arcade Super DK!. Le joueur contrôle le fils de Donkey Kong, Donkey Kong Junior, qui doit délivrer son père capturé par Mario.

locale.title: Tank Wars
locale.synopsis: Protect the Radar Base and yourself from being hit by various enemy tanks, and further trace to defeat every enemy you confront. In this game, you fight by five of your own tanks against 20 enemy tanks in each scene.

Protégez la base Radar et vous-même des ennemis, et progressez en abattant chaque tank que vous rencontrez. Dans ce jeu, vous combattez avec une équipe de cinq tanks contre 20 tanks ennemis dans chaque niveau.

locale.title: Tapper
locale.synopsis:
Tapper is an action game where you're a beer tapper (barman) and have to serve beer to demanding customers. There are four customers, each has its own lane lengthier than the previous one, whom you have to keep at bay. If they reach the end of the lane without receiving their beer, you're a goner; if you miss one and accidentally spill beer needlessly you lose a life and should one of them throw you back the mug and you fail to catch it, you lose a life as well.
Occasionally a bizarre icon will appear on one of the lines and, should you grab it, will invoke a "cabarette"-style show which will keep some of the customers occupied.
The Xbox 360 version includes bonus rounds, as well as co-op and versus multiplayer modes, also online, along with achievements.
En tant que barman, vous devez servir les clients et récupérer leur verre le plus vite possible. Vous avez gagné lorsque tous les clients sont repoussés et abreuvés.

locale.title: Telly Turtle
locale.synopsis: Telly Turtle is basically a port of the LOGO programming language with the main character being a turtle. The keypad buttons of the Colecovision are used to issue commands from a selection presented on-screen and eventually, programs can be formed to move Telly Turtle around the screen in a series of directions. Music and Sound Effects are also added into the mix to broaden the programming experience

Telly Turtle a pour thème langage de programmation LOGO avec comme personnage principal Telly Turtle une tortue. Les boutons du clavier de la Colecovision sont utilisés pour envoyer des commandes à partir d'une sélection présentée à l'écran et des suites de commandes peuvent être faites pour déplacer Telly Turtle autour de l'écran dans une série d'actions.

locale.title: The Activision Decathlon
locale.synopsis:
The Activision Decathlon is a series of Olympic games similar to the Epyx games series. Up to four players can compete in the ten different events of a real-life decathlon, either in sequence or individually. Included are the 100-meter dash, long jump, shot put, high jump, 400-meter race, 110-meter hurdles, discus throw, pole vault, javelin throw, and 1500-meter race.
The flat running events involve simple joystick waggling, which must be balanced with accurately-timed button presses to clear the hurdles - hitting them or breaking stride causes a loss of momentum and thus time. For jumping and throwing events, you must build momentum by waggling and then press the button to throw or jump at what you feel is the appropriate moment.
For each event, points are earned based on how well you do (this can be based on your running time, or how far you throw the javelin or discus, etc...), and the player with the most points at the end of the decathlon wins the gold medal.

Une série de jeux olympiques. Jusqu'à quatre joueurs peuvent participer dans les dix événements différents d'un décathlon, dans l'ordre ou individuellement. Sont inclus le 100 mètres, le saut en longueur, le tir, le saut en hauteur, la course de 400 mètres, le 110 mètres haies, le lancer de disque, le saut à la perche, le lancer de javelot et la course de 1500 mètres.

locale.title: The Dam Busters
locale.synopsis:
Dam Busters is an early flight simulation, set in World War II. It focuses on Dam Busters who historically were used to heavily bombard strategic objectives, in this case dams.
This task is not easy, as en route you will face heavy opposition forces. Fortunately, you won't be a sitting bomber in the air. Your aircraft is equipped with machine guns (left and right) with unlimited rounds of fire power, so fire at will as the enemy approaches.
When the time comes, you will have to bomb the target manually. So, get ready to unload the cargo and give them hell!

Dam Busters se passe pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Il se concentre sur les "Dam Busters" qui ont été utilisés pour bombarder les objectifs stratégiques.La tâche n'est pas facile, car en cours de route, vous ferez face à diverses forces d'opposition. Heureusement, votre avion est équipé de mitrailleuses (à gauche et à droite) avec des munitions illimitées.

locale.title: The Dukes of Hazzard
locale.synopsis:
Driving around in the car known as the "General Lee", you must avoid all sorts of obstacles in an attempt to catch up to Jeremiah Stinge. Beware though as Boss Hog and his police force are trying to chase you. The Duke boys are as usual on the side of right in this scenario and it's Jeremiah who has orchestrated things to put them on the wrong side of the law.
The gameplay is a top-down view of your vehicle heading down a path vertically across the screen. Also on the screen is your speedometer, a bonus timer (faster times mean more points!) and a gear shift. The General Lee itself has gears 1 through 4 and higher gears mean MORE SPEED. As for obstacles, the path ahead of you is full of hills and oil slicks making it difficult to catch up to (and pass) your prey.
Successful completion of levels results in faster chases and more obstacles on the road. Also an increased "Boss Hogg" presence.

Conduisez la voiture connue sous le nom de 'General Lee', vous devez éviter toutes sortes d'obstacles pour tenter de rattraper Jeremiah Stinge. Méfiez-vous de Boss Hog et de sa police qui tentent de vous arrêter.

locale.title: The Heist
locale.synopsis: As a cat burglar, it's up to you to collect all of the valuable paintings from each level while avoiding security systems, pits and robotic sentries which move back and forth. Each level is comprised of three floors and ladders connecting them. Your cat burglar has only the ability to jump, and you must rely entirely on that to keep you alive.

En tant que cambrioleur , c'est à vous de collecter toutes les peintures de valeur de chaque niveau tout en évitant les systèmes de sécurité, les fosses et les sentinelles robotiques. Chaque niveau est composé de trois étages et d'échelles qui les relient. Vous avez seulement la capacité de sauter, et vous devez compter entièrement sur cette dernière pour vous garder en vie.

locale.title: The Yolk's on You
locale.synopsis: This game was only a prototype.Get the eggs/chicks into the coop while fighting off hawks, foxes, and snakes. Avoid groundhog holes and don't break any eggs
Ce jeu est un prototype. Obtenez les oeufs / poussins dans la ferme tout en evitant les faucons, les renards et les serpents. Évitez les trous dans le sol et ne cassez aucun oeufs.

locale.title: Threshold
locale.synopsis: Threshold is a simple Shoot'em up game. You are in control of a spaceship at the bottom of the screen and have to shoot several formations of enemies on the top of the screen. To make things more difficult you have limited time in form of a fuel tank which will get refilled after you cleared a number of waves. Besides that your spacecraft is equipped with a laser that tends to overheat. Every shot make the heat bar of the laser increase a bit. Once it reached its maximum you can't fire anymore and are forced to wait until it cooled down while slowly running out of fuel.

Vous contrôlez un vaisseau spatial au bas de l'écran et devez abattre les ennemis qui se trouvent en haut de l écran.Pour rendre les choses plus difficiles vous avez un temps limité sous forme d'un réservoir de carburant qui sera rechargé après avoir abattu un certain nombre de vagues. En outre, votre vaisseau spatial est équipé d'un laser qui a tendance à surchauffer. Chaque coup rempli la barre de surchauffe du laser. Une fois qu'elle a atteint son maximum, vous ne pouvez pas tirer plus et vous êtes obligés d'attendre que le laser refroidisse.

locale.title: Tic Tac Toe
locale.synopsis:
The classic OXO game with options for single or two player frollics..
Players soon discover that best play from both parties leads to a draw. Hence, tic-tac-toe is most often played by young children; when they have discovered an unbeatable strategy they move on to more sophisticated games such as dots and boxes. This reputation for ease has led to casinos offering gamblers the chance to play tic-tac-toe against trained chickens.
The simplicity of tic-tac-toe makes it ideal as a pedagogical tool for teaching the concepts of combinatorial game theory and the branch of artificial intelligence that deals with the searching of game trees. It is straightforward to write a computer program to play tic-tac-toe perfectly, to enumerate the 765 essentially different positions (the state space complexity), or the 26,830 possible games up to rotations and reflections (the game tree complexity) on this space.
The first known video game, OXO (or Noughts and Crosses, 1952) for the EDSAC computer played perfect games of tic-tac-toe against a human opponent.
One example of a Tic-Tac-Toe playing computer is the Tinkertoy computer, developed by MIT students, and made out of Tinker Toys[. It only plays Tic-Tac-Toe, and has never lost a game. It is currently on display at the Museum of Science, Boston.

locale.title: Time Pilot
locale.synopsis: Time Pilot is an arcade style shooter. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you need to destroy the squadrons of enemy craft that are attacking! On each level you have a quota of enemies that need to be destroyed. After fulfilling your quota, a final boss of the level will appear; when destroyed, you will move on to the next level. The game begins in the year 1910, and each time a level is completed you advance in time. In 1910 you only have to face relatively unarmed biplanes, but as the levels advance so does the technology. Each new level brings with it tougher, more heavily armed aircraft including jets, helicopters, and even flying saucers! From time to time, you will encounter a parachute; if you run into this, you will earn bonus points.

A bord de votre vaisseau, vous devez détruire les escadrons d'ennemis qui attaquent! À chaque niveau, vous avez un quota d'ennemis qui doivent être détruits. Après avoir rempli votre quota, le boss final du niveau apparaîtra .Puis vous passez au niveau suivant. Le jeu commence en l'an 1910, et chaque fois qu'un niveau est terminé vous avancez dans le temps. En 1910, il ne faut faire face qu à des biplans relativement désarmés, mais à mesure que les niveaux progressent, la technologie fait de même.A chaque nouveau niveau des avions plus robustes, plus fortement armés, y compris des avions à réaction, des hélicoptères et même des soucoupes volantes!

locale.title: Tomarc the Barbarian
locale.synopsis: In Tomarc the Barbarian Senta is being held captive in a magical cage, and Tomarc needs to rescue her! In this action game you will control both Tomarc and Senta simultaneously. Tomarc is lost in a series of caves somewhere searching for his magic sword, and then must locate Senta to set her free. Deadly rats and other dangers must be avoided as you run and jump around the caves. Meanwhile, Senta must defend herself from giant bats and other creatures while trapped in the cage; although she can't move, she is capable of firing magic at enemies to destroy them. You are able to switch screens between the two characters to select which character to control. Listening to the sound effects can help you determine when the other character is in trouble and you should switch screens.

Senta est retenue prisonnière dans une cage magique, et Tomarc doit la sauver! Dans ce jeu d'action, vous contrôlez Tomarc et Senta simultanément. Tomarc est perdu dans une série de grottes à la recherche de son épée magique, et doit ensuite localiser Senta pour la libérer. Rats mortels et autres dangers doivent être évités. Pendant ce temps, Senta doit se défendre contre les chauves-souris géantes et d'autres créatures alors qu'elle est prisonnière dans la cage. Bien qu'elle ne puisse pas bouger, elle est capable de tirer sur les ennemis pour les détruire. Vous pouvez changer d'écran entre les deux caractères pour sélectionner le caractère à contrôler.

locale.title: Tournament Tennis
locale.synopsis:
Most of the conventions that became standard for tennis simulations appear in this early title - indeed many were pioneered by it. Matches can be played at quarter-final, semi-final or final level - winning at one level automatically moves you onto the next one. They can last for 3 or 5 sets, with a player requiring a 2-game lead to win a set, although a tie-break comes in at 6-6 in all but the final set.
The view is pseudo-3D, from above the court, and features a shadow on the ball to give a more realistic appearance and make it easier to judge its height. Spectators turn their heads to view the action, and ball-boys run on to the court to retrieve a dead ball. Shot speed, direction and spin can all be applied, and forehand and backhand strokes are both available.

La plupart des standard pour les simulations de tennis apparaissent dans ce titre . Les matchs peuvent être disputés aux quarts de finale, aux demi-finales ou en finale. Gagner à un match vous mène automatiquement sur le suivant. Les matchs peuvent durer 3 ou 5 sets, le joueur a besoin d'une avance de 2 jeux pour gagner un set.

locale.title: Tunnels & Trolls
locale.synopsis: Tunnels & Trolls is the second ever fantasy role playing game published. A fantasy role playing game is a game where a leader, usually known as the gamemaster, has created an adventure for a group of friends, and the friends play the game and try to solve the problem or rescue the princess or kill the dragon or whatever. Ken St Andre read and tried to understand That Other Fantasy RPG, and decided that he could invent one that was easier to understand and so T&T was born, over 30 years ago. The game has gone through several editions since then, but it remains popular and is played all over the world. A group of five of us created the latest version: the Deluxe Tunnels & Trolls.
C'est la démo de Tunnels & Trolls pour Colecovision et Coleco Adam. La démo ne comprend que l écran titre animé. Il n'y a pas de son ni de jeu.

locale.title: Turbo
locale.synopsis: It's you and several other cars racing through a variety of landscapes in Turbo. From the starting line onward, you need to maneuver around and pass various cars in your way while racing towards the finish line. Some of the landscapes you'll travel through include city streets, long roads in the country, seaside highways and dark tunnels.

Une course à travers une variété de paysages. Dès la ligne de départ , vous devez dépasser différentes voitures dans des décors tels que la ville, de longues routes de campagne, routes côtières et tunnels sombres.

locale.title: Tutankham
locale.synopsis: Tutankham is an arcade action game played from a top down point of view. You are an explorer in King Tut's tomb on a mission to retrieve as many of the valuable treasures as you can find. In addition to the treasures, you will also find a key in each of the chambers. This is needed in order to unlock the entrance to the next, more difficult chamber. Be careful, for the tomb is guarded by many dangerous creatures! Cobras, bats, scorpions, and more all appear in the maze and will cause you to lose a life if you're caught! To defend yourself you are armed with a laser gun which you can fire left or right, but not up or down. In each of the mazes you are also give one "flash" which can be used to destroy all creatures currently on the screen.

Vous êtes un explorateur dans la tombe du roi Tut pour récupérer autant de trésors que vous pouvez trouver. En plus des trésors, vous trouverez également une clé dans chacune des chambres. Elle est nécessaire pour déverrouiller l'entrée de la chambre suivante qui est plus difficile. Soyez prudent, car la tombe est gardée par de nombreuses créatures dangereuses! Les cobras, les chauves-souris, les scorpions, et plus.Il vous ferons perdre une vie si vous êtes pris! Pour vous défendre vous êtes armé d'un pistolet laser et vous pouvez tirer à gauche ou à droite, mais pas en haut ou en bas.

locale.title: Up 'n Down
locale.synopsis:
This is a home port of a 1983 Sega arcade game that was distributed by Bally Midway.
The object is to drive around a twisty course and collect all the colored flags. You can jump over gaps and over or onto other cars. If you land on another car, you kill them and collect points. You can also collect things like balloons and ice cream cones for bonus points. The faster you collect all the flags, the bigger a time bonus you get.
In later levels, there are dead-ends or gaps and a vehicle that is carrying a flag you need, so you will need to jump on him. If you are hit by another vehicle or go off the course, you lose a life. In two player games, play alternates.

Vous devez conduire sur un parcours sinueux et collecter tous les drapeaux de couleur. Vous pouvez sauter par-dessus les trou et sur les autres voitures. Si vous atterrissez sur une autre voiture, vous l'éliminez et collectez des points. Vous pouvez également collecter des bonus comme des ballons et des cônes de crème glacée pour des points en plus. Plus vite vous collectez tous les drapeaux, plus vous obtenez de bonus de temps.

locale.title: Venture
locale.synopsis: Venture is a conversion of the popular arcade game. You control Winky, the heroic adventurer. Your goal is to collect as many treasures as you can which are scattered throughout numerous dungeons. In each dungeon, there are several chambers which each contain a treasure. Armed only with your crossbow, you need to get past the varied creatures which guard the chamber, snag the treasure, and make it out again. When you collect the treasure from each of the chambers in a dungeon, you can then move on to the next, more difficult dungeon.

Snif! Le premier jeu auquel j'ai joué de ma vie. Je jouais sur les genoux de mon papa, il dirigeait le héro et je tirais sur les monstres. ;') Impossible de regarder ce jeu avec des yeux d'aujourd'hui, c'est bien sûr beaucoup trop basique. Sachez pourtant que ce jeu fait parti des pionniers du jeu d'aventure sur console. Vous dirigez un archer barbare (si l'on se fit à la pochette du jeu, le type torse poil avec son arc) représenté par une petite boule rouge. Aucune action possible sur l'écran principal hormis le déplacement. Sur cette écran, il faut entrer dans l'une des quatre salle du donjon en évitant les monstres verts qui sont invincibles. Dans chaque salle il y a un thème musical et des ennemis différents. Le but est de s'emparer du trésor et de filer. Quand les 4 salles du donjon ont été vidé : bravo donjon suivant. Il n'y a que 3 donjons qui sont à faire plusieurs fois (en fait le jeu n'a pas de fin). Le moment le plus stressant du jeu reste quand vous tardez trop dans une salle et qu'un des monstres vert de l'extérieur arrive à s'infiltrer et fonce droit sur vous. C'est vraiment terrifiant, la musique bien que basique me faisait vraiment baliser étant gamin! Venture, c'est basique mais c'est une ambiance. Si vous n'êtes pas rebutté par les jeux vraiment vieux, c'est à essayer.

locale.title: Victory
locale.synopsis: Victory is based on the Arcade game of the same name. Use your Coleco Roller Controller to rotate your ship as the space around you scrolls by, smack your fire button to take out anything that moves and snag a power-up or two along the way to aid in your quest. Similar in style to Asteroids, but with a moving background.
utilisez la roulette de votre contrôleur Coleco pour faire pivoter votre navire, éliminez tout les ennemis qui se présentent et attrapez les bonus.

locale.title: Video Hustler
locale.synopsis: With an overhead view of the table, you play a billiards variant called "Pocket Ball" with just six object balls. Imprecise control over the aim and velocity of your shots.
Avec une vue au dessus de la table, vous jouez une variante de billard appelée «Pocket Ball» avec seulement six balles.

locale.title: War Room
locale.synopsis: War Room is a simulation of the computerized war game scenarios played out at the highest level of the world superpowers. It is an extremely graphic and realistic representation of a nuclear confrontation between the United States and Russia.

War Room es una simulación de los escenarios computarizados de juegos de guerra que se juegan al más alto nivel de las superpotencias mundiales. Es una representación extremadamente gráfica y realista de un enfrentamiento nuclear entre los Estados Unidos y Rusia.
War Room est une simulation type WarGame. C'est une représentation extrêmement graphique et réaliste d'une confrontation nucléaire entre les États-Unis et la Russie.

locale.title: WarGames
locale.synopsis:
Greetings, Professor Falken. Shall we play a game?
This strategic game is based on the popular 1983 movie of the same name, starring Matthew Broderick. It might remind people of Missile Command but the action is slower and spread over six screens which represent different areas of the U.S.A. Enemy missiles, planes, and subs will attack and you must direct your own forces, which include missiles, planes, subs, and satellites, to intercept them. Each type of defense has strengths and weaknesses (missiles are fast but limited in range, planes are slower but have unlimited range). Satellites are a better all-around defense but are only available every so often. Some weapons aren't available in certain areas, and some enemies are resistant to certain weapons, so you must alter your strategy accordingly.
As your bases and cities are struck, a DefCon indicator for each area will count down and when the overall DefCon reaches 1 for a minute or when all cities and bases are destroyed, a counterstrike is launched and the game is over. The game is won by preventing a counterstrike long enough for a cease-fire to be reached. There's eight different difficulty levels to progress through as you get the hang of it. A two-player mode on the Colecovision lets one player to use the Roller Controller to guide and fire weapons, while the second player inputs keypad commands.

Basé sur le film du même nom de 1983. L'action est répartie sur six écrans qui représentent différentes zones des missiles des ennemis des USA. Les avions et les sous-marins vont attaquer et vous devez diriger vos propres forces, y compris les missiles, les avions, les sous-marins et Satellites, pour les intercepter. Chaque type de défense a des forces et des faiblesses (les missiles sont rapides mais limités dans leur portée, les avions sont plus lents mais ont une portée illimitée). Les satellites sont une meilleure défense , mais ne sont disponibles que de temps en temps. Certaines armes ne sont pas disponibles dans certaines zones, et certains ennemis sont résistants à certaines armes, donc vous devez modifier votre stratégie en conséquence.

locale.title: Wing War
locale.synopsis: Wing War is an action game where you control a dragon. Beginning in your underground cave, your goal is to capture a sparkling diamond. To do this, you will first need to unlock the secret passage by bringing a fire, water and air crystal back to your cave. Crystals can be found by exploring the various locations available, usually you will need to destroy one of the many enemies so they turn into a crystal. Fire and water crystals can not be in the cave alone at the same time, an air crystal must be placed between them; so you will need to bring back the crystals in the order fire, air, water or water, air, fire. Once you've done this a super crystal is formed unlocking the secret passage so you can try to get the diamond! Your dragon has a limited amount of energy; being hit by enemies will cause the energy to deplete, and the game ends when all of your dragons have lost all their energy.

Vous contrôlez un dragon.Vous débutez dans grotte souterraine, votre objectif est de capturer un diamant. Pour ce faire, vous devez d'abord déverrouiller le passage secret en apportant un cristal de feu, d'eau et d'air à votre grotte. Les cristaux peuvent être trouvés en explorant les différents endroits disponibles, généralement vous aurez besoin d'éliminer vos ennemis afin qu'ils deviennent un cristal. Vous devez ramener les cristaux dans l'ordre suivant :feu, air,eau ou de eau,air,feu. Une fois que vous avez fait cela un Supercristal déverrouille le passage secret afin que vous puissiez essayer d'obtenir le diamant! Votre dragon a une quantité limitée d'énergie. Être frappé par les ennemis fera perdre de l'énergie, et le jeu se termine lorsque tous vos dragons ont perdu toute leur énergie.

locale.title: Winky Trap
locale.synopsis:
A hacked version of Mouse Trap replacing the characters with ones from Venture.
Mouse Trap is a 1981 arcade game released by Exidy, similar to Pac-Man. It was ported to three home systems by Coleco; Coleco's ColecoVision, Mattel's Intellivision, and the Atari 2600.
Many differences between Pac-Man and Mouse Trap are aesthetic: the dots become cheese, the player is a mouse, the ghosts are cats, and power pills are bones that turn the player into a dog.
Two distinct player forms creates a relatively complex food chain for a video game. There are other functional differences as well:
The player can open and close the yellow, red, and blue sets of doors at the press of a matching colored button. The player can store dog bones for later use at his or her discretion by pressing a fourth button — a large round "Doggie Button" with a picture of the dog's head on it. The four ghosts are replaced by six cats, worth 100 points for the first cat eaten, 300 for the second, 500 for the third, 700 for the fourth, and 900 for the fifth and subsequent cats. Point values reset when another bone is used. Each cat eaten spawns a slightly faster replacement. A seventh monster, a hawk, will eat both mouse and dog. Only the mid-screen "IN" field stops the hawk, by causing it to move randomly instead of chasing the player, but this will beam the mouse into one of the four corners. Bonus point prizes do not appear at intervals, but are constantly available. Eating one triggers the next in the series to appear. Point values start at 1000 for the first prize and increase by 200 for each subsequent prize, with the last prize being worth 7200 points. When the last prize is eaten, the sequence restarts. There are thirty-two in all: a wedge of Swiss cheese, a paperclip, a safety pin, a key, an apple, a trophy, a candlestick, a pair of scissors, a pair of pliers, a pair of eyeglasses, a clock, a bottle, a gem, a bugle, a screw, a hammer, a diamond ring, a light bulb, a sewing needle, a fork, a thimble, a knife, a cocktail glass, a fishbone, a pear, a peanut, a die, a telephone handset, a die with "C A F" on the faces, a spool of thread, a teacup, and a pistol. There is a 10,000 point bonus for clearing the board of all cheese. A player who ends a stage as a dog will begin the next stage in that form.
Coleco ported Mouse Trap to its own ColecoVision console, with significantly fewer prizes, an option to leave the hawk out, and different sound effects (cats sound like train whistles and the dog sounds like a train engine's "chugga-chugga"). Coleco's Intellivision port adds an audio warning when a cat is about to enter the maze and suffers from blocky graphics, but gameplay is true to the arcade.
Coleco also ported Mouse Trap to the Atari 2600, simplifying graphics and gameplay. The maze is more squat with brighter walls, and doors form a single colored set that flickers. Gameplay basics are the same, but the hawk, the "IN" area, and the bonus prizes are missing, there are three cats instead of six, and all doors move at once. Scoring is also reduced significantly: cheese is worth 1 point instead of 10 points, cats are worth 10 points and do not increase in value, and clearing a maze awards only 100 points.

locale.title: Wizard of Id's WizMath
locale.synopsis:
Spook needs to escape from the King of Id's dungeons. He slips out but Turnkey is in pursuit. He needs to solve math problems to open the way to his escape.
Wizard of Id's WizMath is an educational game to teach mathematics. Using your joystick, you must move blocks into place so they complete a correct math problem and answer. If you push against a block, you will send it flying until it hits a wall or another block. You can also face a block and hold down the button. While keeping the button down, you can then slide the block as needed. There is a sixty second time limit and you are being pursued by Turnkey. Early levels require only one math problem to exit but later levels require two or more.
Early in the game, you can select a floor on an elevator. The higher the floor, the more difficult the math problems. The game also asks your age. The older you say you are, the higher a floor it tries to start you on, although you can select a lower floor.

Un jeu éducatif pour enseigner les mathématiques. À l'aide de votre joystick, vous devez déplacer des blocs pour résoudre un problème mathématique. Si vous appuyez sur un bloc, vous l'enverrez jusqu'à ce qu'il frappe un mur ou un autre bloc. Vous pouvez également faire face à un bloc le faire glisser au besoin.Il y a une limite de soixante secondes et vous êtes poursuivi par Turnkey.

locale.title: Word Feud
locale.synopsis: Victory doesn't always belong to the fastest player in WORD FEUD. It's not enough to quickly find a likely word match in the maze and move your window over it. You must also be sure that it is the right word and that means finding the other copy! Remember ? even if you think you've found the right word. it might not he the one you want because in each round there is always decoy word there to confuse you The decoy word can even he the same word as the one hidden, but with different colors!

La victoire n'appartient pas toujours au joueur le plus rapide. Il ne suffit pas de trouver rapidement une correspondance de mot dans le labyrinthe. Vous devez également être sûr que c'est le bon mot et cela signifie trouver l'autre copie! Rappelez-vous - même si vous pensez que vous avez trouvé le bon mot,l se pourrait que ce ne soit pas celui que vous voulez parce que dans chaque ronde il y a toujours le mot de leurre qui est là pour vous tromper. Le mot de leurre peut même être le même mot que celui caché, mais avec des couleurs différentes!

game.name: Xonox Double Ender - Artillery Duel And Chuck Norris Superkicks

locale.title: Xonox Double Ender: Artillery Duel and Chuck Norri
locale.synopsis:
This is a compilation containing two Xonox game on a single cartridge. The games are:
1. Artillery Duel 2. Chuck Norris Superkicks
The game cartridge has two sides, each with one game. To select a game you simply insert the appropriate end of the cartridge in the console.
Il s'agit d'une compilation contenant deux jeux Xonox sur une seule cartouche: 1. Artillerie Duel nn2. Chuck Norris Superkicks

locale.title: Zaxxon
locale.synopsis:
The Zaxxon defence system must be destroyed in this isometric-viewed shoot 'em up which was originally hugely successful in the arcades. The game has 3 stages, first taking you through Asteroid City, which is heavily protected by aircraft, guns and missiles. Many barriers are alarmed, leaving you with limited space to progress through, and fire must constantly be dodged.
Stage two is a space shoot out against hordes of enemy aircraft - those you failed to destroy in the first part of the task. Complete this and you reach the final battle with Zaxxon, with the game looping with increased difficulty if you can survive the first time. There are 3 distinct skill levels, while controls involve using forward to dive and back to climb, in the manner of flight simulation.

A bord de votre vaisseau spacial, pénétrez dans une forteresse géante sous les canons et les tirs énnemis. Calculez la bonne altitude pour passer les défenses ennemies et franchir les murailles à travers des espaces étroits.

locale.title: Zenji
locale.synopsis: Zenji is an action/strategy game where you control a rolling face throughout a maze. Each section of the maze can be rotated by the face. The goal is to turn the entire maze green by connecting each section of the maze to the source at the center of the screen. After all sections of the maze have been connected, you can move on to the next, more challenging level. In addition to having a time limit to complete your task, you need to avoid the flames and sparks which wander about the maze. From time to time a number will appear in a maze section and count down from 9 to 0. If you touch the number before it disappears, bonus points are earned. As the levels progress, the mazes become larger, trickier and more flames will appear.

Zenji est un jeu d'action / stratégie où vous contrôlez une figure roulant dans un labyrinthe. Chaque section du labyrinthe peut être tournée. Le but est de passer le labyrinthe entier au vert en connectant chaque section à la source au centre de l'écran. Une fois toutes les sections du labyrinthe connectées, vous pouvez passer au niveau suivant, plus difficile. En plus d'avoir un délai pour accomplir votre tâche, vous devez éviter les flammes et les étincelles qui errent sur le labyrinthe. De temps en temps, un compte à rebours de 9 à 0 apparaîtra. Si vous le touchez avant qu'il disparaisse, vous gagnez des points bonus. Au fur et à mesure des niveaux, les labyrinthes deviennent plus grands, plus compliqués avec plus de pièges.
